attributes.action: Petition to re-instate Tom Cleverley into the England World Cup squad
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to get the god of football himself, Mr. Tom Cleverley back into the England team. There is no chance that we will win the World Cup unless we re-instate the midfield maestro, the English Xavi as you may wish to call him, back into his favoured midfield role as a deep-lying playmaker enganche.
